name: Ultimate Fully Loaded Vegan Nachos
description: Ultimate Fully Loaded Vegan Nachos with the most delicious vegan ground "beef" and nacho cheese! An easy and fun weeknight dinner or snack.
recipeIngredient: 1 recipe Easy Vegan Nacho Cheese Sauce
4 tablespoons low sodium soy sauce  (*tamari for gluten free)
1/2 teaspoon liquid smoke, optional but good
1 recipe Vegan Sour Cream (OR store bought)
1 15-oz can black beans, drained and rinsed
2-3  tomatoes, diced or pico de gallo

recipeInstructions.text: Make a batch of Easy Vegan Nacho Cheese Sauce. Warm on the stovetop, then set aside. You should whisk it again until smooth, adding water as needed to thin right before you drizzle it on the chips.
recipeInstructions.name: Make a batch of Easy Vegan Nacho Cheese Sauce. Warm on the stovetop, then set aside. You should whisk it again until smooth, adding water as needed to thin right before you drizzle it on the chips.

itemListElement.text: Add dried TVP, water and soy sauce to a medium pot. Cook, uncovered, over medium-high heat until the water is absorbed.
itemListElement.name: Add dried TVP, water and soy sauce to a medium pot. Cook, uncovered, over medium-high heat until the water is absorbed.

itemListElement.text: Now add olive oil, spices and salt to taste, frying over medium heat until it resembles ground beef. Turn off the heat and set aside.
itemListElement.name: Now add olive oil, spices and salt to taste, frying over medium heat until it resembles ground beef. Turn off the heat and set aside.

itemListElement.text: Drain and rinse the black beans and prepare all the rest of the optional ingredients you wish to use.
itemListElement.name: Drain and rinse the black beans and prepare all the rest of the optional ingredients you wish to use.

itemListElement.text: Arrange the tortilla chips on a large platter (or on individual plates if serving as a meal). Add toppings in this order, or any you prefer: Taco "meat", nacho cheese sauce, sprinkle of black beans, tomatoes, cilantro, jalapenos, onions, salsa/hot sauce and then vegan sour cream and/or avocado/guacamole. Enjoy immediately!
itemListElement.name: Arrange the tortilla chips on a large platter (or on individual plates if serving as a meal). Add toppings in this order, or any you prefer: Taco "meat", nacho cheese sauce, sprinkle of black beans, tomatoes, cilantro, jalapenos, onions, salsa/hot sauce and then vegan sour cream and/or avocado/guacamole.
